processor.name: ApplyRoleMembership
processor.description: Add the account to the following security/capability roles within the system: Subscriber (MetraView)
processor.condition: CREATE PROCEDURE condition @_ExecutePlugin BOOLEAN OUTPUT, @ActionType ENUM -- $ICE:('metratech.com/accountcreation','ActionType')$ AS -- only execute if -- action is either ACCOUNT or BOTH IF ( (upper(CAST(@ActionType AS VARCHAR)) = 'ACCOUNT') OR (upper(CAST(@ActionType AS VARCHAR)) = 'BOTH') ) SET @_ExecutePlugin = TRUE ELSE SET @_ExecutePlugin = FALSE
